question: How many types of gametes will be formed by a parent with genotype 'AaBbCc'?
explanation: The number of types of gametes is given by the formula <katex>$2^n$</katex>, where <katex>$n$</katex> is the number of heterozygous loci. Here, AaBbCc has 3 heterozygous loci (<katex>$n=3$</katex>). So, <katex>$2^3 = 8$</katex> types of gametes.
